attributes.action: Make volunteer London Ambassdors permanent roles
attributes.additional_details:
Can the government please continue to fund the role of volunteer London Ambassador beyond the finish of the London 2012 Games. This would be an addition to the legacy already created by the London 2012 Olympics, one that would retain and promote the feeling of pride that was released by so many during the Games.
Please acknowledge and sustain the public's desire to contribute and volunteer by retaining this vital position.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Greater London Authority.
